call_to_action.title: Contribute to AMRIT and Make a Difference
call_to_action.description: Join our community to help improve healthcare technology for millions. Whether you're contributing code, enhancing documentation, or providing community support, every contribution counts.

join_us.title: Partner with Us to Drive Impact
join_us.description: Join us in our mission to transform communities through innovation and collaboration. We are actively seeking partnerships with forward-thinking technical experts, generous donors, and visionary knowledge leaders. Together, we can create sustainable change and bring our vision to life.

params.footer_description: Integrated with ABDM, empowering healthcare services through digital transformation.
params.location: 3rd Floor,  No. 6-3-1112 AWFIS Oyster Complex, Greenlands Road Somajiguda, Begumpet Hyderabad – 500016, India.
